about_the_game:
Can you survive the backrooms?

Inspired by the wildly popular Backrooms mystery, make your way through various backrooms in an attempt to escape the nightmare you find yourself in. Partner up with friends, leave notes and messages for them to help them escape or lead them on the right path. Don't get side-tracked or lost, if you do it might just be the last mistake you ever make...

1 - 8 Players
Go at it alone or team up with your friends to escape this nightmare, use various items and other means to leave messages or direct your friends on the right path.

Multiple Backrooms to explore
Progress through multiple levels of Backrooms, there's plenty to explore!

Stay In The Lights!
Those who linger in the darkness are more likely to be attacked, STICK TO THE LIGHTS!

Beat your best time
How fast can you escape each Backroom? show off your skill on the leader boards.

Escape from various backroom entities
Go against many terrifying entities all with different strengths and weaknesses. It is best to learn about them before taking them on!

Escape Against
  • Facelings - Generally neutral but have been known to attack if startled or angered.
  • Skin Stealers - Horrifying creatures known to take the skin of their victims, using it as a disguise.
  • TV's - Very temperamental objects that are known to kill in various ways, the main being electrocution at close proximity.
  • Other Players - While other clippers are not guaranteed to betray you in order to escape. Do you really like those odds?
  • Time - Your one true enemy. Time is constantly ticking down. If you fail to escape in time you will become a permanent backroom resident...

Find and use an array of items
  • Chalk - Leave messages on walls for your friends to find.
  • Camera - Take photos of hostile entities. The flash will disorient them and buy you some much needed time to escape.
  • Flashlight - Temporarily light up Dark areas for as long as your battery lasts.
  • Furniture - Find hidden engraved numbers on furniture, useful if you want to escape!
  • Numpad - Type in those hidden numbers here to unlock the door and escape the Backrooms!

Constantly Evolving
This game will constantly evolve as time progresses, new Backrooms will be added, new Items, new Entities and even higher player counts per backroom!

content_descriptors.notes: Psychological Horror with frightening scenes, chases and jump scares.

legal_notice:
Inspired by the Backrooms online mystery.

Check both the Credits area in the menu and 'credits.txt' in the root directory for a list of everyone who made this possible!
name: Survive The Backrooms!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or newer
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
